name: PDG Divergence Research
description: Explored alternative defintions of Probabilistic Dependency Graph inconsistency [1] using different statistical divergences.

name: AI POWER-Seeking Research
description: Worked to generalize the original POWER-Seeking Theorem [1] to partially observable environments.

name: Causal Intention Research
description: Examined the relationship between the Cohen & Levesque [1] and Halpern & Kleiman-Weiner [2] definitions of Intention, in a unified formal model.

name: Information Extraction Research
description: Analyzed frequency of different error types for document-level template filling models.

name: Word Vector Geometry Research
description: Worked on analyzing the geometry of syntactic classes in word vector embeddings.

name: Machine Learning Intern
description: Researched and implemented machine learning algorithms for cybersecurity anomaly detection.
